emerging_markets.title: Brazilian oil could find new destinations in the face of Trump's tariffs
emerging_markets.snippet: Brazil has logistical and commercial flexibility to preserve the competitiveness of its oil on the international market if the 50% tariff announced by U.S. President Donald Trump o…

emerging_markets.title: Trump's tariffs on Brazil could make your coffee even more expensive
emerging_markets.snippet: President Donald Trump plans to impose a 50% tariff on Brazilian imports, which will hit coffee drinkers. The U.S. imports most of its coffee from Brazil.

emerging_markets.title: This is a win for Trump and the markets, Sandra Smith says
emerging_markets.snippet: 'Kudlow' panelists Sandra Smith and Steve Moore discuss President Donald Trump's economic agenda. #foxbusiness #obama #trump #russia
